ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fresh from admonishing BP before the world, President Barack Obama now gets his moment with the oil companyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s leaders. It will be on his turf and, he vowed to an angry nation, on his terms.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Scientists provided a new estimate for the amount of oil gushing from the ruptured well in the Gulf of Mexico on Tuesday that indicates it could be leaking up to 2.52 million gallons of crude a day. The latest numbers reflect an increase in the flow that scientists believe happened after undersea robots earlier this month cut off a kinked pipe.
